post.title: Major Changes to WSDL 1.2
post.content: Jeff Schlimmer has the latest on the new drafts of WSDL 1.2. Given my general issues with WSDL, I’m very excited about the changes. Port Type -> Interface. Service/Port -> Service/End Point. Plus a whole new document on message patterns. Want to read, but for now, I must sleep.
post.excerpt: Jeff Schlimmer has the latest on the new drafts of WSDL 1.2. Given my general issues with WSDL, I’m very excited about the changes. Port Type -> Interface. Service/Port -> Service/End Point. Plus a whole new document on message patterns. Want to read, but for now, I must sleep.
